## Part 1

Creating a vector and learning about it!
```{r}
vec_1 <- c(2, 5, 9, 10, 8, 12, 1, 0)
class(vec_1)
typeof(vec_1)

vec_1_e3 <- vec_1[3]
vec_1_e1 <- vec_1[1]
vec_1_e5to7 <- vec_1[5:7]

vec_1_char <- as.character(vec_1)
```

Making the second vector!
```{r}
vec_2 <- c(town = "Santa Barbara", location = "Rincon", swell = "south")
class(vec_2) #class character
length(vec_2) #length 3
vec_2_e2 <- vec_2[2]
```

Making a data frame!
```{r}
df_1 <- data.frame(region = c("A","B","A","D"), 
                   species = c("otter", "great white", "sea lion", "grey whale"), 
                   count = c(12, 2, 36, 6))

class(df_1) #class "data.frame"
class(df_1$species) #class "character"

max_count <- max(df_1$count)
```
